member.summary: Default action claim type.

member.summary: Default resource claim type

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimPermission.Copy
member.summary: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
member.returns: A copy of the current permission.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimPermission.Demand
member.summary: Throws a at run time if the security requirement is not met.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimPermission.CheckAccess(System.String,System.String,System.Security.Claims.Claim[])
member.summary: Calls ClaimsAuthorizationManager.
member.returns: True when access is granted. Otherwise false.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimPermission.FromXml(System.Security.SecurityElement)
member.summary: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
member.param: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimPermission.Intersect(System.Security.IPermission)
member.summary: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
member.param: A permission to intersect with the current permission. It must be of the same type as the current permission.
member.returns: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission. This new permission is null if the intersection is empty.
member.exception: The parameter is not null and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimPermission.IsSubsetOf(System.Security.IPermission)
member.summary: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
member.param: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship. This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.
member.returns: true if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, false.
member.exception: The parameter is not null and is not of the same type as the current permission.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimPermission.IsUnrestricted
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether unrestricted access to the resource protected by the permission is allowed.
member.returns: true if unrestricted use of the resource protected by the permission is allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimPermission.ToXml
member.summary: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
member.returns: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimPermission.Union(System.Security.IPermission)
member.summary: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
member.param: A permission to combine with the current permission. It must be of the same type as the current permission.
member.returns: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
member.exception: The parameter is not null and is not of the same type as the current permission.

member.name: T:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.CryptoRandom
member.summary: A class that mimics the standard Random class in the .NET Framework - but uses RNGCryptoServiceProvider internally.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.CryptoRandom.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.CryptoRandom.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.CryptoRandom.Next
member.summary: Returns a nonnegative random number.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to zero and less than .

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.CryptoRandom.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a nonnegative random number less than the specified maximum.
member.param: The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated. must be greater than or equal to zero.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to zero, and less than ; that is, the range of return values ordinarily includes zero but not . However, if equals zero, is returned.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.CryptoRandom.Next(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a random number within a specified range.
member.param: The inclusive lower bound of the random number returned.
The exclusive upper bound of the random number returned. must be greater than or equal to .
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to and less than ; that is, the range of return values includes but not . If equals , is returned.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.CryptoRandom.NextDouble
member.summary: Returns a random number between 0.0 and 1.0.
member.returns: A double-precision floating point number greater than or equal to 0.0, and less than 1.0.

member.name: M:Thinktecture.IdentityModel.CryptoRandom.NextBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Fills the elements of a specified array of bytes with random numbers.
member.param: An array of bytes to contain random numbers.
